Student and Faculty Interaction system for a College.
Interaction SMVDU is a website that provide system for student and faculty interaction. It contains profile view where you can see interest of other person and other details. It also contain a blogging system for posting research and articles. Provides other functionalities like messaging,inbox , feedback and complaint system.


Languages/Script :
HTML, Javascript, CSS, PHP , Ajax, XML
FrameWork :
Github Link :
github.com/codingeass/interaction-smvdu
